rules.title: Rules
rules.behaviour.title: Behaviour
rules.behaviour.content: We won't tolerate abuse of any kind. If you're out and about attacking people, you won't last long here.
rules.quality.title: Quality
rules.quality.content: Take some pride in what you share. Trolling, spamming, flooding and posting over-the-top nonsense isn't okay.
rules.relevance.title: Relevance
rules.relevance.content: Place messages in their relevant channel. Messages made in the wrong places for their content will be asked to move.
rules.suitability.title: Suitability
rules.suitability.content: Sexually explicit, shocking or life-threatening content is strictly prohibited. If you wouldn't show it to your child or your parents, do not post it.
rules.exclusivity.title: Exclusivity
rules.exclusivity.content: You cannot advertise your own stuff here without permission. All forms of advertising are prohibited, including unsolicited DMs.
rules.adherence.title: Adherence
rules.adherence.content: This is our common space to hang out and we like our peace â€” do not disturb it. If you make no effort to coexist with others, you will be removed.
rules.other.title: Other
